title: ranked rewards?
body: do you even get something if you play ranked? I'm sorry i am new to lol but i just don't know if you get at least some IP after the season.

replies.body: but i don't think that you will get any rewrds this season, becasue it takes time to get lv 30 and then you are to sohrt lv 30 that you are able to get the rewards

No worries, traditionally there have been rewards for the end of each season.  This season is still on-going, so we we don't have any information or updates on rewards right now.  We haven't done IP rewards, but instead icons or skins.  You'll want to bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page for any announcements as we draw closer to the season's end.
